sourceMeaningMnemonic:
The radical <radical>master</radical> and the kanji <kanji>master</kanji> have the same meanings!

This kanji also means <kanji>main</kanji> because the master is the main person of a dojo or household or business.
readingMnemonic: Do you remember back to the radical mnemonic, where the <kanji>master</kanji> is floating a water drop above his head? Imagine back to there. Once you do, the most amazing thing happens. The master sends the drop of water into a <reading>chu</reading>te (<ja>しゅ</ja>) and it goes careening through an intricate series of them.
readingInfo: Picture this master of water controlling the droplet as it flies around inside these chutes, like he's solving a difficult puzzle with it. Astounding!
